original_title: Hurop-Hurop Kan Kapadagusan Kan Agi-Agi Kan Gamgam Na Adarna
overview: The night before the lockdown, while reviewing some unused footages from my latest film project (Hinulid), a small box from an anonymous sender arrives. The box contains a Bikol translation of the Tagalog long poem, Ibong Adarna, and an egg.

production_companies.name: National Commission for Culture and the Arts

title: A Meditation on the Possible Ending of the Mythical Bird Adarna
